16 or 24 circular needle 1 st holder 1 st marker m begin long tail co 96 sts join in the round being careful not to twist pm to mark beg of round round 1 k1 *p2 k2 repeat from * across to last 3 sts p2 k1 round 2 k2tog work in established rib k the k and p the p to last 2 ssk 2 sts decrease d round 3 k1 work in established rib to last st k1 work rnds 2-3 fourteen times more 66 sts on needle you will now be working in row and not in the round turn the work so that you will be working next on a ws row remove the marker row 1 3 5 ws sl 1 wyib k9 p to last 10 sts k10 row 2 and 4 rs sl 1 wyib k all sts row 6 sl1 k9 m1 k to last 10 sts m1 k10 2 sts increase d work row 1-6 8 times total 82 sts on needle cont to keep the first and last 10 sts of every row in garter st while slipping the first st of every row for 12 more row you will end having worked a rs row shape hood ws sl 1 wyib k9 p31 sts turn and place the other 41 sts onto a holder next row rs bobble 2 sts k to end of row 39 sts on needle next row sl 1 wyib k9 p to last st sl 1 with yarn in front repeat the last 2 row 3 times more 33 sts on needle cut yarn and place rem sts onto a holder reattach yarn to ws of sts on holder and bobble 2 sts p to last 10 sts k10 39 sts on needle next row rs sl 1 wyib k to last st sl 1 with yarn in back next row ws bobble 2 sts p to last 10 sts k10 37 sts on needle repeat the last 2 row two times more 33 sts on needle work the first 33 sts from the holder with these sts in kitchener st sew the shaped hood seam block lightly and weave in all ends ©2016 plymouth yarn company 020316vle designed by vanessa ewing abbreviations beg= begin ning bobble= bind off co= cast on cont= continue decrease= decrease increase= increase m= marker m1= make one p=
